genes.name: Sodium Excretion
genes.effect: Produces sodium chloride.

genes.name: Sickle Cell Trait
genes.effect: Slight stamina drain; strong resistance to poison/malaria-like effects.

genes.name: Brittle Bone Disease
genes.effect: Greatly increased fall and impact damage; extra harm from knockback.

genes.name: Cancerous Growth
genes.effect: Random health degeneration over time; reduced healing efficiency.

genes.name: Aquagenic Allergy
genes.effect: Contact with water causes brief damage and nausea.

genes.name: Metabolism Boost
genes.effect: Minor movement speed and mining speed increase.

genes.name: Photosynthesis
genes.effect: Slow hunger/food regen in sunlight.

genes.name: Detox Enzyme
genes.effect: Slight resistance to poison and negative effects.

genes.name: Fermentation Pathway
genes.effect: Enables ethanol fermentation.

genes.name: Basic Healing Factor
genes.effect: Small passive regeneration out of combat.

genes.name: Spore Resistance
genes.effect: Resist nausea, allergens, and spore clouds.

genes.name: Heat Shock Protein
genes.effect: Minor fire resistance bursts; longer burn tolerance.

genes.name: Cold Tolerance
genes.effect: Reduced freezing and slowness; improved snow mobility.

genes.name: Chitin Layer
genes.effect: Tiny defense buff (â‰ˆ +1 armor) and small knockback resist.

genes.name: Bioluminescence
genes.effect: Soft light aura in darkness.

genes.name: Lactate Cycle
genes.effect: Produces lactic acid.

genes.name: Acetobacter Lineage
genes.effect: Produces acetic acid.

genes.name: Methylotrophy
genes.effect: Generates methanol.

genes.name: Cellulose Synthase
genes.effect: Produces cellulose fibers.

genes.name: Penicillin-like Pathway
genes.effect: Produces simple beta-lactam antibiotics.

genes.name: Pectinase Expression
genes.effect: Enables pectin breakdown for processing.

genes.name: Amylase Pack
genes.effect: Breaks starch into simple sugars.

genes.name: Slime Polysaccharide
genes.effect: Produces industrial gums and gels.

genes.name: Vitamin Pathway (Basic)
genes.effect: Synthesizes common vitamins.

genes.name: Hemophilia
genes.effect: You bleed on damage (DoT); while bleeding gain brief strength and haste bursts.

genes.name: Fibroblast Growth
genes.effect: Mutates the FGFR3 gene, leading to short stature.

genes.name: Neurotransmitter Boost
genes.effect: Faster mining/attack speed and mild focus.

genes.name: Hemoglobin Variant
genes.effect: Breathe underwater or in low-oxygen zones.

genes.name: Adrenaline Trigger
genes.effect: Strength boost at low HP; brief sprint burst.

genes.name: Venom Synthesis
genes.effect: Melee attacks apply short poison to mobs.

genes.name: Silk Spinneret
genes.effect: Produces spider-silk-like fibers.

genes.name: Chloroplast Optimization
genes.effect: Faster hunger regen in sunlight; mild night penalty.

genes.name: Burst Regeneration
genes.effect: Short bursts of strong healing after damage.

genes.name: Toxin Resistance
genes.effect: Immune to poison; reduced wither effect.

genes.name: Thermogenesis
genes.effect: Enhanced cold climate boost; flame aura when hit.

genes.name: Kinetic Muscle
genes.effect: Higher jump and sprint speed; slight fall mitigation.

genes.name: Polycarbonate Pathway
genes.effect: Produces polycarbonate pellets.

genes.name: Carbon Precursors
genes.effect: Generates carbon nanotube precursor chemicals.

genes.name: Nitration Pack
genes.effect: Synthesizes explosive precursor mixes.

genes.name: Broad-Spectrum Antibiotic
genes.effect: Produces advanced antibiotics.

genes.name: Growth Hormone Line
genes.effect: Synthesizes growth factor serum.

genes.name: Styrogenesis
genes.effect: Creates monomers, specifically: styrene.

genes.name: Bioplastic Refinery
genes.effect: Creates bioplastics such as PLA/PHA.

genes.name: Biolubricant Chain
genes.effect: Produces bio-based lubricants.

genes.name: Antifungal Serum
genes.effect: Produces antifungal compounds.

genes.name: Collagen Weave
genes.effect: Generates collagen mesh for armor crafting.

genes.name: Chemoautotrophy Pack
genes.effect: Biofuel oil phase and nitrate salts production.

genes.name: Marfan Syndrome
genes.effect: Extends melee/build reach; slight reduction in max health.

genes.name: Neural Overclock
genes.effect: Extreme mining & attack speed; tunnel vision side-effect.

genes.name: Quantum Enzyme
genes.effect: Short-range teleport dash with cooldown.

genes.name: Extreme Regeneration
genes.effect: Instant heal burst consuming food reserves.

genes.name: Adaptive Chitin
genes.effect: Major armor increase with scaling knockback resist.

genes.name: Mycelial Symbiosis
genes.effect: Share slow regeneration with nearby allies.

genes.name: Oxygen Synthesis
genes.effect: Self-generate breathable air in hostile atmospheres.

genes.name: Radiant Bioluminescence
genes.effect: Powerful light aura; brief blind on nearby mobs.

genes.name: Neuroinhibitor Aura
genes.effect: Weakness aura against nearby hostiles.

genes.name: Immortal Cell Cycle
genes.effect: Prevent one death per in-game day; long cooldown.

genes.name: Nanocellulose Forge
genes.effect: Produces ultra-strong nanocellulose materials.

genes.name: Biophotonic Array
genes.effect: Organic logic/circuit components.

genes.name: Alien Neurotoxin Line
genes.effect: Synthesizes potent xenoneurotoxins.

genes.name: Bio-dynamism Cascade
genes.effect: Creates bio-reactive charges and shock gels.

genes.name: Advanced Nootropics
genes.effect: High-end cognitive enhancers.

genes.name: Protein Scaffold Fabricator
genes.effect: Generates scaffolds for bio-armor and tools.

genes.name: Phase-Change Mucus
genes.effect: Briefly phase through 1-block gaps; slippery sprint.

genes.name: Electrocyte Array
genes.effect: Emit short electric burst; trickle-charge bio machines.

genes.name: Hardened Carapace
genes.effect: Massive armor with a small speed penalty.

genes.name: Photoshade Negentropy
genes.effect: Very slow passive heal and hunger freeze in darkness.

genes.name: Void Pressure Tolerance
genes.effect: Immunity to vacuum/pressure damage; slight speed loss.

genes.name: Prion Instability
genes.effect: Progressive degeneration over time; occasional chaotic surges in other gene effects.
